summary.span: 管理角色中的用户成员资格，以便在 ASP.NET 应用程序中进行授权检查。

span.span: Manages user membership in roles for authorization checking in an ASP.NET application.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 角色管理可用于管理应用程序基于组的用户使用，称为角色的授权。ASP.NET role management enables you to manage authorization for your application based on groups of users, referred to as roles. 通过将用户分配给角色，你可以控制对不同部分或基于角色而不是，或者除，Web 应用程序的功能的访问指定基于用户名称的授权。By assigning users to roles, you can control access to different parts or features of your Web application based on role instead of, or in addition to, specifying authorization based on user name. 例如，员工应用程序可能具有角色管理器、 员工、 控制器和等等，例如为每个角色都指定了不同的权限。For example, an employee application might have roles such as Managers, Employees, Directors, and so on, where different privileges are specified for each role. 用户可以属于多个角色。Users can belong to more than one role. 例如，如果你的站点是一个论坛，但有些用户可能正在成员和审查方的角色。For example, if your site is a discussion forum, some users might be in the role of both Members and Moderators. 你可以定义每个角色可以在站点上，具有不同权限并在这两种角色的用户将然后具有这两个集的权限。You might define each role to have different privileges on the site, and a user who is in both roles would then have both sets of privileges. 若要启用角色管理 ASP.NET 应用程序，使用的元素`system.web`部分应用程序的 Web.config 文件中，如以下示例所示。To enable role management for your ASP.NET application, use the element of the `system.web` section in the Web.config file for your application, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` Web 应用程序的配置文件中或以编程方式在代码中，你可以指定授权规则。You can specify authorization rules in the configuration file for your Web application or programmatically in your code. 例如下, 一节从 Web.config 文件要求用户 （通过拒绝匿名用户），登录，然后仅允许用户要具有访问权限的管理员角色中。For example, the following section from a Web.config file requires users to log on (by denying anonymous users), and then allows only users in the Administrators role to have access. ``` ``` 如果你使用`authorization`中应用程序的 Web.config 文件以指定基于角色，应用程序的用户授权部分必须提供身份验证的用户标识。If you use the `authorization` section in your application's Web.config file to specify authorization based on roles, users of your application must supply an authenticated user identity. 你可以通过使用 Windows 或 Forms 身份验证对用户进行身份验证。You can authenticate users by using either Windows or Forms authentication. 无法将匿名用户分配到角色。Anonymous users cannot be assigned to a role. 独立的或与 ASP.NET 结合使用，可以使用角色类。Roles can be used independently of, or in conjunction with, the ASP.NET classes. 若要以编程方式验证角色的成员身份，你可以使用类或具有属性方法，也可以使用具有属性方法。To verify role membership programmatically, you can use the class or the property with the method, or you can use the property with the method. 有关示例代码，用于以编程方式检查角色成员身份，请参阅本主题中的示例部分。For sample code that programmatically checks role membership, see the Example section in this topic. 类还使你可以创建和删除角色，还可以将用户添加到或从角色中删除用户。The class also enables you to create and delete roles and to add users to or remove users from roles. > [!NOTE] > 如果已配置应用程序使用类，不能修改角色或角色成员身份。If you have configured your application to use the class, you cannot modify roles or role membership. 仅在 Windows 安全 classverifies 成员身份组。The classverifies membership in Windows security groups only. 在这种情况下，你必须使用 Windows 用户帐户管理，而不是 ASP.NET 角色创建和删除组和管理组成员身份。In this case, you must use Windows user account management rather than ASP.NET roles to create and delete groups and manage group membership. 可以将角色信息存储在多个数据源。You can store role information in several data sources. - 你可以使用类，以检索其角色信息根据 Windows 组的成员身份。You can use the class to retrieve role information based on membership in Windows groups. - 通过使用存储在 SQL Server 数据库角色信息类。You can store role information in a SQL Server database by using the class. - 如果你有现有的角色信息，或者想要存储中的角色信息和从 Windows、 授权存储或 SQL Server 以外的数据源中检索角色信息，你可以通过创建一个类继承实施自定义角色提供程序抽象类。If you have existing role information, or want to store role information in and retrieve role information from a data source other than Windows, an Authorization Store, or SQL Server, you can implement a custom role provider by creating a class that inherits the abstract class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[实现角色提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/851671ce-bf9b-43f2-aba4-bc9d28b11c7d)。For more information, see [Implementing a Role Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/851671ce-bf9b-43f2-aba4-bc9d28b11c7d). 如果用户的浏览器中接受 cookie，你可以在用户计算机上的 cookie 中存储为该用户角色信息。If a user's browser accepts cookies, you can store role information for that user in a cookie on the user's computer. 对于每个页请求，ASP.NET 将该用户角色信息读取 cookie。On each page request, ASP.NET reads the role information for that user from the cookie. 通过减少与数据源需要检索其角色信息的通信，这可以提高应用程序性能。This can improve application performance by reducing the amount of communication required with the data source to retrieve role information. 如果用户的角色信息太长，若要存储在一个 cookie，ASP.NET 将只存储最近使用的角色信息在 cookie 中，然后查找作为所需的数据源中的其他角色信息。If the role information for a user is too long to store in a cookie, ASP.NET stores just the most recently used role information in the cookie and then looks up additional role information in the data source as required. 如果用户的浏览器不支持 cookie 或禁用 cookie，则角色信息不会缓存在 cookie 中。If the user's browser does not support cookies or cookies are disabled, role information is not cached in a cookie. 你可以提高缓存在 cookie 中通过指定的角色名称的可靠性属性配置 ASP.NET 角色时。You can improve the reliability of the role names cached in a cookie by specifying a property when you configure ASP.NET roles. 默认值是`All`，该加密 cookie 中的角色名称和验证的 cookie 内容没有已改变。The default is `All`, which encrypts role names in the cookie and validates that the cookie contents have not been altered. ## Examples 下面的示例演示配置为使用 ASP.NET 成员资格和 ASP.NET 角色和要使用的应用程序的 Web.config 文件将成员资格和角色的信息存储在 SQL Server 数据库。The following example shows the Web.config file for an application configured to use both ASP.NET membership and ASP.NET roles and to use the to store membership and role information in a SQL Server database. 只有管理员角色中的用户允许访问应用程序和用户进行身份验证通过 forms 身份验证。Users are authenticated with forms authentication and only users in the Administrators role are allowed access to the application. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例以编程方式检查登录的用户是否在管理员角色允许用户查看其他用户的角色之前。The following code example programmatically checks whether the logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view other users' roles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用默认角色提供程序将指定的用户与数据源中的指定角色关联。The method calls the default role provider to associate the specified users with the specified role at the data source. 如果你的应用程序使用类，在调用期间执行数据库更新方法将在事务内完成。If your application uses the class, the database updates that are performed during the call to the method are made within a transaction. 如果遇到错误，如已指定角色的用户名，事务将回滚并不执行任何更新。If an error is encountered, such as a user name that is already in a specified role, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed. > [!NOTE] > 用户名称和角色名称不能包含逗号。User names and role names cannot contain commas. ## Examples 下面的代码示例向角色中添加一个或多个用户，或从基于用户输入的角色中删除用户。The following code example adds one or more users to a role or removes a user from a role based on user input. 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . Public Shared Property ApplicationName As String
public: static property System::String ^ ApplicationName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要存储和检索其角色信息的应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application to store and retrieve role information for.

value.span: 要存储和检索其角色信息的应用程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the application to store and retrieve role information for.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性由类，以将用户和角色与不同的应用程序相关联。The property is used by the class to associate users and roles with different applications. 这使多个应用程序使用相同的数据源而不会遇到重复的用户名称或重复的角色名称之间的冲突存储用户和角色信息。This enables multiple applications to use the same data source to store user and role information without running into conflicts between duplicate user names or duplicate role names. 多个 ASP.NET 应用程序可以通过指定相同的值中使用相同的数据源属性。Multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same data source by specifying the same value in the property. 你可以设置属性以编程方式，你也可以设置它以声明方式为 Web 应用程序配置文件中使用`applicationName`属性。You can set the property programmatically, or you can set it declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application by using the `applicationName` attribute. 如果使用 Web 应用程序类和值没有为指定`applicationName`配置文件中的属性当前属性值使用属性。If your Web application is using the class and a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file, the property value for the current property is used. > [!CAUTION] > 因为所有服务的请求使用单个默认角色提供程序实例对象，您可以有多个请求并发执行，并尝试设置属性值。Because a single default role provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 属性不是线程安全的多个写操作，并不断变化属性值可能会导致多个用户的应用程序的意外行为。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 应避免编写代码以允许用户设置属性，除非要求。You should avoid writing code to allow users to set the property, unless required. 应用程序的示例设置属性可能需要是管理应用程序管理多个应用程序的角色数据。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages role data for multiple applications. 此类应用程序应为单用户应用程序和不是 Web 应用程序。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application. ## Examples 下面的示例演示中的元素`system.web`的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分。The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它指定应用程序使用实例并设置`applicationName`属性设为`MyApplication`。It specifies that the application uses a instance and sets the `applicationName` attribute to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当前用户的角色是否已缓存在某个 Cookie 中。

span.span: if the current user's roles are cached in a cookie; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`在 Web.config 文件中，每个用户角色信息存储在 cookie 中。When the property is set to `true` in the Web.config file, role information for each user is stored in a cookie. 当角色管理检查以确定用户是否对特定角色中时，角色 cookie 将检查之前的角色提供程序调用以检查数据源中的角色列表。When role management checks to see whether a user is in a particular role, the roles cookie is checked before the role provider is called to check the list of roles at the data source. 动态更新 cookie 缓存最近已验证的角色名称。The cookie is dynamically updated to cache the most recently validated role names. 你可以提高缓存在 cookie 中通过指定的角色名称的可靠性属性配置 ASP.NET 角色时。You can improve the reliability of the role names cached in a cookie by specifying a property when you configure ASP.NET roles. 默认值是`All`，该加密 cookie 中的角色名称和验证的 cookie 内容没有已改变。The default is `All`, which encrypts role names in the cookie and validates that the cookie contents have not been altered. > [!NOTE] > 由于可以脱离数据源缓存角色名称，有可能对数据源中的角色管理的更改不会反映在缓存的值。Because role names can be cached apart from the data source, it is possible that changes to role management at the data source would not be reflected in the cached values. 在这种情况下，用户必须关闭并重新打开其浏览器，以清除缓存的 cookie 值。In this case, the user must close and re-open their browser to clear the cached cookie value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示中的元素`system.web`的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分。The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它指定应用程序使用实例并设置`cacheRolesInCookie`属性设为`true`。It specifies that the application uses a instance and sets the `cacheRolesInCookie` attribute to `true`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以为你的应用程序指定在其中缓存角色 cookie 的名称，通过设置`cookieName`ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的属性。You can specify the name of the cookie where roles are cached for your application by setting the `cookieName` attribute in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. 当你想要唯一标识你的应用程序的 cookie 或 cookie 共享跨多个应用程序，如域 cookie 时，这非常有用。This is useful when you want to uniquely identify a cookie for your application or when a cookie is shared across multiple applications, such as a domain cookie. ## Examples 下面的示例演示中的元素`system.web`的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分。The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它指定应用程序使用实例并设置`cookieName`属性。ASPROLES。It specifies that the application uses a instance and sets the `cookieName` attribute to .ASPROLES. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够直接引用应用程序的默认角色提供程序。The property enables you to directly reference the default role provider for an application. 这通常用于访问自定义的成员的角色提供程序的一部分抽象类。This is commonly used to access custom members of the role provider that are not part of the abstract class. 例如，类包括的重载使您能够确定用户是否在常见的 Windows 角色中使用的方法枚举值。For example, the class includes an overload of the method that enables you to determine whether a user is in a common Windows role by using a enumeration value. 对引用类应用程序可以通过使用来获取属性并且可以强制转换为为了引用的重载。A reference to the class for an application can be obtained by using the property and can be cast as a in order to refer to the overload. 如果为应用程序配置了多个角色提供程序，则可以访问不同的角色提供程序使用集合。If multiple role providers are configured for an application, you can access different role providers using the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将强制转换的默认角色提供程序中的作为并检查是否当前登录的用户为管理员角色允许用户查看应用程序的角色设置之前。The following code example casts the default role provider as a and checks whether the currently logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view roles settings for the application. 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性引用为应用程序启用的所有角色提供程序，包括任何提供程序添加到 Web.config 文件中。The property references all the role providers enabled for an application, including any providers added in the Web.config file. 你可以控制哪些角色提供程序是可供应用程序使用`providers`在你的应用程序的 Web.config 文件中部分的元素。You can control which role providers are available for an application by using the `providers` element of the section in the Web.config file for your application. 下面的示例演示一个中删除任何现有提供程序 （如那些在 Machine.config 文件中指定） 的节，并添加为应用程序的角色提供程序的实例。The following example shows a section that removes any existing providers (such as those specified in the Machine.config file) and adds a instance as the role provider for the application. ``` ``` 你可以获取的提供程序的强类型化的引用编制角色提供程序索引按名称，然后将它强制转换为所需的类型的集合。You can obtain a strongly typed reference to a provider from the collection by indexing the role provider by name and casting it as the desired type. 你可以获得有关应用程序中使用的默认提供程序的引用属性。You can obtain a reference to the default provider for an application using the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例列出了为应用程序和它们各自的类型启用的提供程序。The following code example lists the providers enabled for an application and their respective types. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用默认角色提供程序，来从数据源中的指定角色中删除指定的用户。The method calls the default role provider to remove the specified users from the specified role at the data source. 如果应用程序使用类，在调用期间执行数据库更新方法将在事务内完成。If the application uses the class, the database updates that are performed during the call to the method are made within a transaction. 如果遇到错误，如不属于指定角色的用户名，事务将回滚并不执行任何更新。If an error is encountered, such as a user name that is not in a specified role, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法以从角色中删除一个或多个用户。The following code example uses the method to remove one or more users from a role. 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see .
